## Vector4.NormalizeToRef() method

Updates the given vector "result" from the normalization of the given one.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static NormalizeToRef(vector: ReadOnlyVector4, result: Vector4): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vector | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | the vector to normalize |
|  result | <code>Vector4</code> | the vector to store the result in |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
